name: Seraph in the Siann Den
description:
What is the alignment problem? What does it mean to serve humans? 

The fate of humanity is in your hands. Will you save them?

This is our little entry for the Dungeon Crawl Game Jam 2023.

Created in roughly 3 days using the Godot game engine.

Download available for Windows, Mac, and Linux. 

For easy installation, consider using the excellent itch.io app.

Source code is here for those that are interested.
